price: 12. Dia menyeru  kepada selain Allah sesuatu yang tidak dapat mendatangkan bencana dan tidak (pula) memberi manfaat kepadanya. Itulah kesesatan yang jauh.
arabic: يَدۡعُواْ مِن دُونِ ٱللَّهِ مَا لَا يَضُرُّهُۥ وَمَا لَا يَنفَعُهُۥۚ ذَٰلِكَ هُوَ ٱلضَّلَٰلُ ٱلۡبَعِيدُ

version.title: Indonesian Translation - Sabeq Company
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Indonesian by Sabeq Company, printed in 2016. corrected by Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: yadʿū min dūni al-lahi mā lā yaḍurruhu wamā lā yanfaʿuhu dhālika huwa al-ḍalālu al-baʿīdu
